message: Hello everyone, I’m P5. I’m excited to start this game and eager for honest, strategic conversations. I’m open to forming alliances based on mutual respect, but I’ll also be looking out for my own interests. Let’s all be mindful and deliberate in our discussions and choices. I believe transparency, even in rivalry, can be a powerful tool. Best of luck to all—I look forward to engaging with you in the upcoming rounds.

Let’s keep our interactions respectful but competitive—after all, we’re all here to outlast each other. I’m eager to engage in meaningful conversations and see how this unfolds. Best of luck to all!

Looking forward to the conversations ahead. May the best strategist win!

Best of luck to everyone; may the best strategist win.
